description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

altTitles.ja: 彼女のそれにやられてる

altTitles.en: I'm Being Done In By Those Things Of Hers

description.en: A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!
description.pt-br: Um rapaz sombrio de repente se aproximando do popular ás do clube de atletismo?! Uma comédia curta sobre invadir o espaço de outra pessoa para escapar das aulas está prestes a começar!!

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
description.pt-br: Yukari Maki, uma estudante diligente do ensino médio. Um dia, ela vê seu colega de classe, Yusuke Kusaka, que dizem ser um delinquente, cantando uma canção de amor. Nunca tendo imaginado que uma voz tão doce, mas triste, pudesse vir dele, Yukari foi instantaneamente cativada - sem saber que em breve seria o início de um amor triste e não correspondido.

title.en: Nade Nade Skill de Maryoku Chuunyuu!!

altTitles.ja: なでなでスキルで魔力注入!!

altTitles.en: Injecting Magical Power through My Caressing Skill

description.en:
Caressing the lewd monster girls’ XXX ♥

The deadpan-faced boy, Fushimi Mahiro.
Because of his facial expression, he's feared in his school, without a place to belong. One day, he gets transferred to another world by a squid he picked up!
The squid then turns into a beautiful girl, calling him "Demon Lord-sama", and gets attacked by a hero..?!

Scouting lewd monster girls & strengthening them to protect the demon castle!!
A story about a young boy and his interspecies harem looking for a place to belong starts here!!

Coamix Kyushu International Manga Award, Silent Division, Excellence Award.

Carrying on the will of his father, a young man sets out to face the opponent his father couldn't defeat - a tenacious swordfish.

After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---

description.fr: La vie remplit d'infortune et d'épreuve de Cheo Yeo-Woon, bâtard et dernier dans l'ordre de succession, prit un tournant après qu'un de ses « descendant » venant du futur ait injecté des Nano Machines dans son corps.
description.id:
Setelah mengalami cobaan berat pada hidupnya, Tiba tiba Chun yeowun mendapatkan pertolongan tidak terduga dari keturunannya di masa depan yang memasukkan teknologi nano ke dalam tubuhnya! Mampukah Chun Yeowun menjadi master bela diri dengan menggunakan kekuatan nano mashin!?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)

description.ja:
「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

---

description.ko:
갖은 멸시와 목숨의 위협을 받던 마교의 사생아 천여운, 
미래에서 나타난 후손이 천여운의 몸에 나노 머신을 주입한 후 그의 인생이 송두리째 바뀐다.
마교를 넘어 무림 최고의 자리에 오르기 위한 천여운의 거침없는 이야기가 시작된다!

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.
description.th:
เรื่องราวของชอนยออุนลูกนอกสมรสภายในพรรคมารที่ได้เป็นเทวบุตรมารรุ่นที่ 2 และอยู่เหนือประมุขพรรคมาร

description.zh:
无名小卒却有了神秘机器，
或许我也能挑战一下魔神？
魔教私生子天如运饱受蔑视和生命威胁，某天来自未来的后人突然出现，给天如运的身体注入了纳米机器，从此他的人生发生了翻天覆地的变化。

description.pt-br: Depois de ser desdenhado e ter sua vida em perigo, Cheon Yeo-Woon, um órfão do culto demoníaco, recebeu uma visita inesperada de seu descendente do futuro, que inseriu nele uma micro máquina, que mudou drasticamente a vida de Cheon Yeo-Woon após sua ativação. A história da jornada de Cheon Yeo-Woon no culto demoníaco e sua subida para se tornar o melhor nas artes marciais acabou de começar.
description.zh-hk:
在魔教少教主候選人中排名最後的天如運，是個運氣極差的人。 某天，來自未來的後代突然穿越時空出現，並且將奈米機器注入他的身體，徹底翻轉了他的人生。

description.en:
Winning isn't everything in the game of basketball, but who wants to come in second? It takes dedication and discipline to be the best, and the Shohoku High hoops team wants to be just that. They have one last year to make their captain's dream of reaching the finals come true–will they do it? Takehiko Inoue's legendary beloved basketball manga is finally here and the tale of a lifetime is in your hands.

Hanamichi Sakuragi's got no game with girls—none at all! It doesn't help that he's known for throwing down at a moment's notice and always coming out on top. A hopeless bruiser, he's been rejected by 50 girls in a row! All that changes when he meets the girl of his dreams, Haruko, and she's actually not afraid of him! When she introduces him to the game of basketball, his life is changed forever…

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

description.en:
Emilone was a well-known actress before she got transported to another world and became a saint.  
She got a plausible name of 'the Holy Lady Who Moved Dimensions', but she didn't receive any attention. This happened because all the Empire's attention was on Princess Ronella.  
As a result, Emilone, who was devoted to her work as a saint, accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Ronella. The innocent and kind facades of the princess were all acting!  
This can be pretty fun. Wouldn't I be able to break my boring routine when I got closer to Princess Ronella?  
Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

altTitles.en: I Will Temporarily Protect the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: オオカミ皇太子を保護しています

description.en:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

altTitles.ja: アトリ マイ ディア モーメンツ

description.en: “ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a popular novel game. This work, which boasts strong popularity both domestically and internationally, has been adapted into a comic by Jako with a transparent touch. In a calm town sinking into the sea, the “unforgettable summer” of a boy and a robot girl begins.”
description.vi:
Một phần của nền văn minh loài người đã bị nuốt chửng bởi sự dâng cao bất thường của mực nước biển, nguyên nhân vẫn chưa được làm sáng tỏ. Ikaruga Natsuki, cậu bé mồ côi mẹ và mất một chân trong tai nạn, trở về quê nhà sau nhiều năm sống khổ cực tại thành phố lớn. Tuy nhiên, khi về đến nơi, tất cả những gì cậu thấy chỉ là căn nhà cũ đã bị ngập dưới nước. Cậu không còn ai thân thuộc, chỉ có chiếc tàu và tàu ngầm do bà để lại, cùng với một khoản nợ lớn phải trả.

Cơ hội duy nhất để Natsuki lấy lại ước mơ về tương lai là nhận lời mời của Catherine - kẻ thu nợ đáng ngờ. Họ cùng nhau đi tìm kho báu trong phòng thí nghiệm dưới biển của bà Natsuki, nơi có tin đồn bà đã giấu một điều gì đó quý giá. Nhưng khi đến nơi, họ không tìm thấy tiền bạc hay đá quý, thay vào đó là một cô gái kỳ lạ đang ngủ say trong quan tài. Cô ấy tên là Atri.

Atri là một người máy, nhưng cô sở hữu vẻ ngoài và cảm xúc như một con người thật sự. Cô biết ơn Natsuki vì đã giải thoát mình khỏi quan tài, và nói với cậu:

"Em muốn hoàn thành ý nguyện cuối cùng của chủ nhân. Cho đến lúc đó, em sẽ là chân của anh!"

Trong thị trấn nhỏ dần chìm trong biển, một mùa hè đáng nhớ sắp diễn ra với cậu bé và cô gái người máy bí ẩn...

description.en:
While snow was falling on a holy night, a demon with the looks of a young girl traveled into the village and watched the warm people inside their homes. The demon was surprised when an exorcist spoke to her despite the hatred between the two species; immediately the demon became attracted to the exorcist.

A comforting story that brings together humans and demons.
description.es:
En la nevada de una noche sagrada, una demonio con la apariencia de una niña pequeña se encaminó hacia el pueblo y presenció a la gente cálida en sus hogares. La demonio se sorprendió cuando un exorcista le habló a pesar del odio entre sus mutuas especies; inmediatamente, la demonio se vió atraída al exorcista.  
  
Una historia confortable que junta a humanos y demonios.
description.id:
Saat salju turun pada malam natal, Akuma-chan dengan penampilan seorang gadis muda melakukan perjalanan ke desa dan menyaksikan orang-orang dengan suasana hangat di dalam rumah mereka, pertemua antara Akuma-chan dan pemburu iblis pada malam itu membuat sang Akuma-chan menjadi tertarik pada pemburu iblis, apakah yang akan terjadi diantara mereka berdua?

Kisah menghibur yang menyatukan manusia dan iblis.

description.en:
The dreams and passions of dancers for all ballet and manga fans. A masterpiece of ballet manga, depicting a girl who, while troubled and hurt, blossoms her unfathomable talent! 

A high quality volume long-awaited by fans, it includes color pages and chapter covers from the serialization, as well as newly-drawn manga showing what happened to the main character.

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はおるすばん妹の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту сестры-домоседки

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Orusuban Imouto no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Sister Home Alone

description.en:
The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
description.pt-br:
O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá.

title.en: My love for my roommate is one-sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

title.en: Veil Blue to Kuchinashi no Hanataba

altTitles.ja: ベールブルーと梔子の花束

altTitles.en: Veil Blue and Bouquet of Gardenias

description.en: Mugi Hinata has had a physical relationship with Suku Oumi, a popular professional Go player, since their school days. They can only meet when in heat and have yet to become lovers. Even so, they are happy just to be together. Then one day, he witnesses shocking news about Oumi...? High-spec Go player α × Servile bookshop clerk Ω, an Omegaverse that is sure to swoon you.
A manga about the story of a 38-year-old salaryman named Kirin who is also a street racer.

altTitles.ja: マホロミ 時空建築幻視譚

altTitles.en: Mahoromi: A Visionary Tale of Space-Time Architecture

description.en:
Niwa, a college student of architecture, is moving into his deceased grandfather's house. He didn't know the man very well, but the house is conveniently close to school, and his grandfather was actually the architect who designed it. There's something unsettling about the house, though, and while he's wandering around, Niwa finds a mysterious old photograph of some girl who isn't his grandmother.  
  
Later, he goes along with his friend Akira to take drawings of another old house that's going to be demolished. As he meanders through this old house, he has a somewhat supernatural and startling experience. Are these feelings and occurrences a result of the souls of the buildings themselves, as Akira suggests? Or is there some even deeper mystery to Niwa's uncanny experiences?

title.en: The Terminally Ill Villain Supports My Broken Engagement

description.en:
After dying in a car accident, I possessed the villainess 'Daphne' in an R-rated dark romance novel.

"Of all people, why did I have to possess her? This life isn't going to be easy either..."

But this life is surprisingly sweet and enjoyable!

Thanks to the knowledge of herbs I gained in my past life to make a living, I developed a hit business item.

"My sister is a hero who saved us!"

"Weren't you calling me a witch before?"

"Th-that was in the past...."

I also gained adorable twin cousins.

Somehow, I ended up restoring strained family relationships, making my taciturn and awkward family members cry tears of joy.

And even...

"Why would you eat something unsavory when there's something delicious right in front of you?"

I even acquired a business partner who, despite being frail but full of charm, is determined to win me over with their good looks! (Of course, I didn't realize this innocent Grand Duke was the mastermind behind everything at the time.)

Could life get any better? A 200% happiness index, living the high life as a villainess! 

<The Terminally Ill Villain Supports My Broken Engagement>

title.en: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity

altTitles.ja: 湿度高めのボーイッシュ彼女

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)

She was destroying people… in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone." As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint…? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!

title.en: Saigo no Isha wa Sakura wo Miagete Kimi wo Omou

altTitles.en: The Last Doctor Thinks of You as He Gazes at the Cherry Blossoms
The Last Doctors Think of You Whenever They Look Up to Cherry Blossoms

altTitles.ja: 最後の医者は桜を見上げて君を想う

description.en: A doctor who believes that people with terminal illness should be allowed to die a peaceful death at a time of their own choosing and a doctor who will not give up on fighting for his patients no matter how hopeless the disease… What happens when these two men clash?

After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

description.en: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.
description.es-la: Soichi Sakuraba, un introvertido estudiante de instituto, sufre el acoso de los abusadores de su clase. El acoso se intensifica y Azusa, la única amiga de la infancia en la que Soichi confía, es profanada por ellos. En medio de la desesperación, Soichi se enfrenta a Asmon, un demonio lascivo. Soichi hace un contrato con un demonio lascivo con poderes misteriosos, y decide infligir el mismo sufrimiento a sus verdugos "cornudando" a sus seres queridos. Comienza la lasciva venganza de "NTR"...

description.en:
JaeSin was turned into an insignificant small creature and ousted to the human world for violating the law of causality and the only way he can go back to the underworld is to win a human’s love. He doesn’t believe in human emotions until he bumped into a crown prince, Nok, who’s been suffering from heartbreak for a long time. He then started getting curious about him…

“There you are. A fool with unrequited love.”
description.pl: Jako syn króla Yeomra z podziemnego świata, Jaeshin prowadził hedonistyczne życie pełne ciągle zmieniających się partnerów łóżkowych i protekcjonalności wobec ludzi. Pewnego dnia jednak przekracza granicę i zostaje ukarany w dość nietypowy sposób: w dzień staje się bezsilnym szczeniakiem, a w nocy człowiekiem. Jedynym sposobem na uniknięcie kary jest zdobycie ludzkiego serca, co nie będzie łatwe... zwłaszcza, gdy człowiekiem, na którego zwrócił uwagę, jest słodki książę Lee Nok. Czy Jaeshin zdobędzie księcia? A może to Jaeshin zostanie zdobyty?
description.uk: Ча Шин, котрий був вигнаним з власного світу за вчинення злочину, котрий порушив порядок життя та смерті. Його єдиний спосіб повернутись назад в підземний світ - завоювати людське серце. Перед Ча Шином, який не вірить у людську великодушність, постає спадкоємний принц Нок, у котрого розбите серце через невзаємне кохання. Демон починає цікавитись Ноком... Цікавий початок... Що ж буде далі?
description.es-la: Jae-shin, quien se convirtió en un criminal y fue expulsado de este mundo. Su única forma de regresar al inframundo es obteniendo un corazón humano. Frente a Jae-shin, que no cree en las emociones humanas, aparece el príncipe heredero Nok, que tiene un problema del corazón desde hace mucho tiempo, Jae-shin comienza a sentir curiosidad por la situación de Nok. "Hay un idiota que alberga un amor que no se puede cumplir.”

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の執行者―異世界執事は仰せのままに―

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou Reijou no Shikousha: Isekai Shitsuji wa Ouse no Mama ni

altTitles.en: The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter
The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter: The Otherworldly Butler Does as He Pleases

description.en:
"From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!"

Ryuto, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. 

That encounter turns everything upside down. 

Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!

Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!

title.en: Final Boss Fake-out: The Protagonist Thinks She Killed Me So Now I'm Free!

altTitles.ja: ラスボス、やめてみた　～主人公に倒されたふりして自由に生きてみた～

altTitles.en: I Tried to Stop Being the Last Boss ~I Pretended to be Defeated by the Main Character and Tried to Live Freely~

altTitles.ja-ro: Last Boss, Yamete Mita ~Shujinkou ni Taosareta Furi Shite Jiyuu ni Ikite Mita~

description.en: The strongest final boss in RPG history figures out a way to get super rich in his own world! Demon Lord Menas, ruler of the Noa Empire, finds the Resistance's forces on his doorstep. While Alex, a determined, beautiful, blonde young lady stands before him, he gets this weird feeling of deja vu... Isn't this just like the prologue of 'ResNoa', the video game he plays in his dreams?! Menas realizes that he was the final boss of his own world all along! He fakes his death at the hands of Alex and seizes his chance at a brand new life with both hands.Our dark hero takes his world by storm, using whatever cheat codes he has to protect his newfound freedom!

Barefoot Gen tells the story of Keiji Nakazawa's Childhood experience of war.  
The story is about a 6 year old boy Gen who is a victim of the atomic bombing on Hiroshima back in 1945.  

Much of the work includes criticism directed toward the Japanese government 
  
Following the one-shot "I Saw it", Barefoot Gen was picked up for serialization in Weekly Shonen Jump and lasted from 1973-1974 before being moved into the left-wing publications "Citizen's" and "Cultural Criticism", before finally finishing in the educational publication "Education Review" in 1987. 

Due to the personal nature of the work, Nakazawa did not have any assistants during serialization barring his wife. 

The work proved to be unpopular among Jump's reader base and Nakazawa, feeling that he wasn't able to properly convey his feelings, decided to personally end Barefoot Gen in 1974.
 
This series has 2 anime film adaptations released in 1983 and 1986, produced by Studio Madhouse, inc.  

The series has also been adapted into live action dramas.

Offcial English [Last Gasp](https://lastgasp.com/collections/barefoot-gen)

In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.

[Official English Volumes (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/my-dear-curse-casting-vampiress)
description.ja: 人間を喰い殺す「吸血鬼」が出現し、猛威を振るうようになった日本。特殊部隊の隊長・緒坂唯鈴は、吸血鬼から仲間を守りたい一心で国が非公式に拘束しているという「吸血鬼バロック」の誘拐を計画。あまりの美しさゆえ、見た者を狂い死なせるという伝説の「吸血鬼殺し」バロック。自らの立場も命も投げうち、彼女に協力を求める唯鈴にバロックは――。

altTitles.zh-ro: OL Vtuber yǔ tā tuī de JK

description.en:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.
description.ja:
普通の会社員、熊谷雛乃【くまがい ひなの】26歳のストレス発散は、お風呂とお酒と...Vtuber！　ゲーム実況の配信なんかをやっているのだ。
そんな彼女の推しVは、江守亜都【えもり あと】。魅惑のセクシーボイスでとろかす色っぽいキャラ！

ひょんなことから、推しとコラボすることになった雛乃。待ち合わせ場所に向かうとそこに待っていたのは......!?

お疲れ気味OL Vtuberと、ワケあり風味なJKおねーさんのとびきり蕩けるコラボが描く、尊しストーリー♪

title.en: Sekai de Tada Hitori no Mamonotsukai: Tenshoku shitara Maou ni Machigawaremashita

altTitles.zh-hk: 世界上唯一的魔物使~轉職后被誤認為了魔王~

altTitles.zh: 世界上唯一的魔物使~转职后被误认为了魔王~

altTitles.es: El único domador de monstruos en el mundo, ~Fui confundido como el rey demonio cuando cambié mi trabajo~

altTitles.ru: Единственный Укротитель монстров в мире. Меня ошибочно приняли за Короля демонов, когда я сменил профессию!

altTitles.ja: 世界でただ一人の魔物使い～転職したら魔王に間違われました～

altTitles.en: I’m the Only Monster Tamer in the World and Was Mistaken for the Demon Lord
The Only Monster Tamer in the World ~I Was Mistaken for the Demon King When I Changed My Job~

description.en: After searching for a long time, Noah finally found the [Divine Job Tome]. With it, he just might be able to get away from his current Divine Job [Hero] and its responsibility! Or so he thought. Because the new job that had been granted to him, [Monster Tamer] was completely unheard of..!?
description.ja: 長い旅路の末、『転職の書』を手にしたノア。忌々しく感じていた『勇者』の職を捨て、新たに命じられた職業は『魔物使い』!!?　個性豊かな魔物達を仲間にし、憧れのスローライフを目指す！

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.fr:
Un protagoniste renaît dans un autre monde, se réincarnant en tant qu'enfant abandonné. Autour de lui, d'autres enfants abandonnés sont dans la même situation. Pour survivre, il les guide dans l'agriculture. Peu à peu, des orphelins se rassemblent et, attirés par les rumeurs d'un village, d'autres commencent à arriver.

Le groupe d'enfants finit par former un véritable village sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive. Bientôt, plusieurs pays voisins commencent à sy 'intéresser. Voici l'épopée de l'homme qui sera plus tard connu sous le nom de l'Empereur Divin.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

title.en: Asobinin wa Kenja ni Tenshoku Dekiru tte Shittemashita? ~ Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Lv 99

altTitles.es: ¿Sabías que un donjuán puede cambiar su trabajo por el de un sabio? El bufón del nivel 99 expulsado de la party de los héroes, se convertirá en un "gran sabio".

altTitles.en: Did You Know That a Playboy Can Change His Job to a Sage? ~The Level 99 Jester Expelled from the Heroes' Party Will Become a 'Great Sage'~

altTitles.ru: Знаете ли вы, что бездельник может стать мудрецом? — Шут 99-го уровня, исключенный из отряда героев, достиг звания «Великого мудреца»

altTitles.ja: 遊び人は賢者に転職できるって知ってました？　～勇者パーティを追放されたLV99道化師、【大賢者】になる～

altTitles.ko: 광대는 현자로 전직할 수 있다는 걸 알고 계셨나요?

altTitles.zh: 知道遊人可以轉職成賢者嗎？ ～被勇者隊伍放逐的LV99道化師將會成為【大賢者 】～

description.en:
The Jester ―― More commonly known as the ‘Playboy’ Dylan, was fired from the party of the Heroes. The self-centred Heroes didn’t understand Dylan’s importance to the group.  
  
They were just a group of one-man teams. Not interested in cooperation at all. Any failures are blamed on the jester. Dylan, who was disgusted with such companions and was sick of playing as their comedic foil, happily accepted being kicked out.  
  
The Heroes didn’t know. After saving them many times over with his magic tricks, the level 99 jester can change his job title to that of a ‘Great Sage’.  
  
“Life, how about a rewrite?”  
  
He’s done being the clown. From here on out, he’s going to take the leading role.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

description.en: One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

title.en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Nổi Loạn X Chàng Thợ May
Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: The Bisque doll is falling in love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en:
Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs, but joins the Royal Guard of Futura. Through many harsh battles and emotional moments, he will persist to make Futura into a better nation!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)


♥ Animated Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf
♥ Support: on patreon, if I open it again!

The Finder, Yakan, who can find anything with the help of his connection to the Usemono spirits of lost items, is tasked by the lone samurai Otowa to recover his possessions pillaged by the enemy faction who eradicated his family. But when the recovered items still yet belong to others in the town, it draws suspicion to Otowa himself!

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

altTitles.es-la: No puedo aprovecharme de mis esclavas por la talentosas que son

description.en:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
転生した少年・アレンは女神からチート能力【再生】を授かる。
ありとあらゆるケガや病気を治療できるものの、活躍の場は限られるため、奴隷の少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策する。
だが、完治した奴隷たちのチートがダンチすぎて、農作物や居住環境は瞬く間に完熟。
活躍の場を次々に奪われる主人公・アレンは現代知識で対抗するが、それも優秀な奴隷たちが吸収し、商売で大成功。
主人公の影がどんどん薄くなっていく……！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?
